segments.text: Have you ever served in any international trading company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I once worked in a small company for one year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My reason for leaving is that I wish to get into the advertising business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What have you learnt from this short experience ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've learnt a lot about business knowhow . I got to know what kind of knowledge was needed in my future work .
segments.speaker: S2
